column4: anyone know of a better irc chat then xchat and pidgin? I'm using irssi because it does a better job of auto typing, etc
lemme give that a try, ty
although I think it's text based.. but if you like that I think it's the best around
I'm using irssi right now, so txt based is fine... I just want one that I can scroll up with and maybe log, but also be able to use "tab" to auto fill names, etc
I've never used bitchX myself.. but I've heard it being mentioned.. hope it works for you
I'm using the gnome version of xchat.. not very fancy but it's enough for me
I have that one, but I got addicted to the auto fill if irssi when all I had was terminal... I play it old school :-D
autofill? you mean tab completion of nicks? if so xchat does that
it wouldnt do it for me, it gave me a HUGE list after I typed tab
ah.. you want to be able to browse the list of nicks matching? well.. xchat won't do that for you =/
no, thats what it did do... i typed tab, and a huge list appeared in the chat log
I'm not following here.. what do you want it to do?
for example, I type Sl <tab> i want it to auto go to Slart or cycle the Sl list of users
ah that's what I mean by browse.. my bad..
currently it just displays a list of users in the chat log that begins with those names
its a huge ease when doing messaging to one person or another
if you've typed in enough characters it will autofill it.. if it's ambigious it will show you the options..
